title: [Scarletowl's Magic Shoppe]
[Scarletowl's Weaponry]
[Scarletowl's Outfitting]
description: Beneath a low skylight-set ceiling, a pearl-handled filigreed mandolin hangs on one of the smooth mistwood walls.  A gold-leafed mistwood cabinet and a glass-covered box case sit in opposite corners while some puffed raw silk pillows rests on a colorful mosaic floor.
